description: When downloading new email, Outlook automatically creates local copies of email messages in OLK14MESSAGE files. These files are stored to subdirectories of the [user]/​Documents/​Microsoft User Data/​Office 2011 Identities/​Main Identity/​Data Records/​Messages/​ directory.

OLK14MESSAGE files can be opened manually by double-clicking them. While they are stored in a proprietary format, you can still sometimes view fragments of text in the message files using a text editor such as Apple TextEdit.
